WYSIWYM.model
Class DependencyTree

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Graph
      WYSIWYM.model.DependencyTree

public class DependencyTree
extends Graph

DependencyTree represents one sentence in the text plan. It holds DTNodes and DTEdges.

Version:
1.00 2006/11/13, 1.1 20-09-2007, 1.4 08-08-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

 boolean flash()
          Checks whether this tree should be marked in the feedback text.
 int getAggregated()
          Returns the aggregation status; @see WYSIWYM.libraries.LinguisticTerms for the possible values.
 DTNode getConjunction()
          Returns a node with a conjunction (if there is more than one, a random choice).
 DTNode getFlaggedNode()
          Returns the first node it finds that's flagged
 DTNode getInsertedSource()
          Returns the node that was inserted as source, or if it's more than one, their conjunction.

          Returns all nodes inserted as source individually

          Checks whether source and target have been inserted the other way around.
